Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
MenuItem
public class MenuItem extends Object
Backend class which handles many functions pertaining to the menu_item and item_price tables in the database

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem()

  • Method Details

    • getAllMenuItems

      public static Vector<String> getAllMenuItems()
      Gets a vector of all availale items on the menu. On the frontend, this function is used to display all the buttons on the employee view.
      Returns:
      vector of all menu items

    • getName

      public static String getName(int menuItemID)
      Given an ID of a menu item, returns its corresponding name
      Parameters:
      menuItemID - id of the menu item
      Returns:
      name of the menu item

    • getPrice

      public static double getPrice(int itemid, char size)
      Given an ID of a menu item and a size, returns the price of the menu item for that size
      Parameters:
      itemid - id of the menu item
      size - size of the menu item (s,m,l) for small, medium, large
      Returns:
      price of the menu item for the given size

    • getType

      public static String getType(int menuItemID)
      Given an ID of a menu item, returns its corresponding type
      Parameters:
      menuItemID - id of the menu item
      Returns:
      type of the menu item (appetizer, entree, side, drink, etc.)

    • getIDGivenName

      public static int getIDGivenName(String name)
      Given the name of a menu item, returns its corresponding menu item ID
      Parameters:
      name - name of the menu item
      Returns:
      id of the menu item

    • getNextItemID

      public static int getNextItemID()
      Finds the maximum menu item ID, adds 1, and returns that value
      Returns:
      the next available item id integer

    • addMenuItem

      public static void addMenuItem(String name, String type, double smallprice, double medprice, double largeprice)
      Adds an item to the menu. Updates both the menu_item and item_price tables in the database
      Parameters:
      name - name of the new item
      type - type of the new item
      smallprice - small price of the new item
      medprice - medium price of the new item
      largeprice - large price of the new item

    • removeMenuItem

      public static void removeMenuItem(String name)
      Removes an item from the menu. The database entry is not deleted, instead everything is set to N/A and 0.0 just in case any data from a previously existing menu item wants to be pulled
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item to be removed

    • changePrice

      public static void changePrice(int menuItemID, double newSmallPrice, double newMedPrice, double newLargePrice)
      Changes the price of an item in the menu. Only the item_price table is modified because name and type aren't changed
      Parameters:
      menuItemID - id of the menu item being modified
      newSmallPrice - new small price of the menu item
      newMedPrice - new medium price of the menu item
      newLargePrice - new large price of the menu item

    • getSalesReportNames

      public static Vector<String> getSalesReportNames()
      Gets a list of all item names on the menu to be displayed for the sales report.
      Returns:
      vector of all menu items

    • getSalesReportNumbers

      public static Vector<Integer> getSalesReportNumbers(String startDate, String endDate)
      Given a range of dates, gets a list of the total number of sales for each item in that range in order to be displayed for the sales report
      Parameters:
      startDate - start date for collecting data
      endDate - end date for collecting data
      Returns:
      vector of sales numbers for each menu item
